nodes.text: The Zonama Sekotan fighter was a three-lobed bioship armed with lava cannons and propelled by a dovin basal that Zonama Sekot grew for defense against the Yuuzhan Vong.

The Zonama Sekotan fighter lacked a conventional hyperdrive. The vessel was also similar to the Yuuzhan Vong's coralskippers. Some of them were piloted by Jedi and starfighter pilots, but most of them were capable of independent action or were piloted by Sekot itself.
